job.title: Site Reliability Engineer // NYC // Cloud
job.description: A global leader in analytics consulting and technology is looking for a Site Reliability Engineer to join their NYCbased team This fastgrowing company helps toptier clients through marketing optimization improved customer insights and datadriven decisioningbrbrAs an SRE you will be responsible for transforming the existing DevOps framework You will focus on automation CICD container orchestration infrastructure as code IaC and securitybrbrstronguRequirementsbrustrongul liBachelors degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience li liWorking experience in both AWD and Azure environments li liProficient scripting in Bash Python andor PowerShell li liUnderstanding of Docker li brbrulstronguThe Offerbrustrongul liCompetitive Salary Up to 145Kyear DOEli li10 bonus li brbrulstronguYou Will Receive The Following Benefitsbrustrongul liComprehensive health insurance li li401kli liGenerous PTOli liContinued trainingeducation programsli brbrulemApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a fulltime basis now and in the futurebrbremstrongPosted Bystrong Carolyn Regimbalbrbr
